pages.text: The Pneumatic Wrench is the $(thing)wrench/$ item for $(pncr). You can use it for a variety of tasks, including:$(p)$(li)$(thing)Right-click/$ vanilla and modded blocks to rotate them$(li)$(thing)Sneak+right-click/$ $(pncr) machines to drop them as items, preserving any stored upgrades and air in the machine.

$(li)$(thing)Right-click/$ $(l:base_concepts/drones)Drones/$ to dismantle them, dropping them as an item.$(li)$(thing)Right-click/$ $(l:tubes/pressure_tubes)Pressure Tubes/$ to close/re-open sections to isolate them from each other.$(p)The $(item)Pneumatic Wrench/$ must be pressurized in a $(l:machines/charging_station)Charging Station/$ before use.
